title: Revenue of Sonic Corporation in the U.S. from 2009 to 2018
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 10 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is moderately negative which exists from 2013 to 2009.
On the contrary, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2016 to 2013.
Additionally, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2018 to 2016.
gold: This statistic shows the revenue of Sonic Corporation in the United States from 2009 to 2018 . In 2018 , Sonic Corp. generated a revenue of 423.59 million U.S. dollars . Sonic Corporation , founded in Oklahoma , United States in 1953 , is a drive-in fast-food restaurant chain .
